original_title: Senior Prof. Pathmalal Manage appointed VC of J’Pura University
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe appointed Senior Professor Pathmalal M. Manage as the Vice Chancellor of the Sri Jayawardenepura University for a three-year term with immediate effect, the President's Media Division (PMD) said.
Prior to this appointment, Prof. Manage was the Dean of the Faculty of Graduate Studies.
